meta.description: Definitions of the different pieces that are allowed in the track layout.

field-descriptions.type: string describing the piece type, e.g., 'straight' or 'curve'
field-descriptions.length: length of the piece in millimeters, or null if not applicable. Do not specify length for angled pieces. We calculate it from the radius and angle.
field-descriptions.angle: angle in degrees, or null for straight pieces. For example a curve piece that takes 12 pieces to make up a full circle would have an angle of 30 degrees (360 / 12 = 30)
field-descriptions.radius: circle radius in millimeters. For straight pieces, set to null.
